description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
flavorText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.
name: Chempunk Pickpocket
